你过去 10 秒内有使用火焰技能?: 近期有格挡传奇怪物击中?

Have you used a Fire Skill in the past 1: this will lessen the enemy's chance to hit, and thereby increase your evade chance.
你过去 10 秒内有使用火焰技能?: 这将减少敌人的击中几率从而提高你的闪避几率.

Have you used a Fire Skill in the past 1: This also implies that the enemy is Chilled.
你过去 10 秒内有使用火焰技能?: 这也意味着敌人被冰缓.

Have you used a Fire Skill in the past 1: this will apply Shock's Damage Taken modifier to the enemy.
你过去 10 秒内有使用火焰技能?: 这将对敌人应用感电伤害的加成.

Have you used a Fire Skill in the past 1: 10% increased Attack Damage Taken by enemy
你过去 10 秒内有使用火焰技能?: 敌人承受攻击伤害提高 10%

Have you used a Fire Skill in the past 1: 10% increased Spell Damage Taken by enemy
你过去 10 秒内有使用火焰技能?: 敌人承受法术伤害提高 10%
敌人移动速度额外降低 20%

Have you used a Fire Skill in the past 1: 20% increased Fire Damage Taken by enemy
你过去 10 秒内有使用火焰技能?: 敌人承受火焰伤害提高 20%

Have you used a Fire Skill in the past 1: Your enemy will automatically be considered to be Unique if one of the Boss options is selected.
你过去 10 秒内有使用火焰技能?: 如果已选择 Boss 选项将会自动启用此状态.
岳父/长老 将会应用以下加成:
流血持续时间额外降低 50%
中毒持续时间额外降低 50%
点燃持续时间额外降低 50%

你过去 10 秒内有使用火焰技能?: 在游戏中用于计算角色状态面板

Have you used a Fire Skill in the past 1: This overrides the default damage amount used to estimate your physical damage reduction from armour.
你过去 10 秒内有使用火焰技能?: 设置伤害量会影响你来自护甲的物理伤害减免估算

Have you used a Fire Skill in the past 1: or copy and paste an item from in game (hover over the item and Ctrl+C)
你过去 10 秒内有使用火焰技能?: 或者复制粘贴游戏中的物品(鼠标悬停在物品上 Ctrl+C)

Have you used a Fire Skill in the past 1: to view or edit the item and add it to your build.

Have you used a Fire Skill in the past 1: This will also add it to your build if it's from the unique/template list.
你过去 10 秒内有使用火焰技能?: 如果物品来自 传奇/模版 列表,它也会添加到你的 BD 中

Have you used a Fire Skill in the past 1: If there's 2 slots an item can go in, holding Shift will put it in the second.
你过去 10 秒内有使用火焰技能?: 如果物品可以并需要装备到第二个插槽,请按住 Shitf 键放入其中.

Have you used a Fire Skill in the past 1: You can Control + Click an item to equip it, or drag it onto the slot.
